v0.1, 18-August-2013 -- Initial release.
v0.2, 10-November-2013 -- Add support for state files across sessions.
v0.3, 12-December-2013 -- Add support for notes using the RSS feed.
v0.3.1, 12-December-2013 -- Forgot to send the action verb with notes feed.
v0.3.2, 17-December-2013 -- Yield a Finished after parsing a chunk of notes.
v0.3.3, 18-December-2013 -- Adding readme to the manifest.
v0.3.4, 26-December-2013 -- Correcting a bug where Finished was constructed without arguments.
